TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DataBoundControl extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl
Public MustInherit Class DataBoundControl Inherits BaseDataBoundControl

summary.span: 作為所有 ASP.NET 2.0 版資料繫結控制項的基底類別，這些控制項會以清單或表格式表單顯示其資料。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all ASP.NET version 2.0 data-bound controls that display their data in list or tabular form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是用於擷取表格式 ASP.NET 控制項的基底類別或清單樣式資料 ASP.NET 資料從原始檔控制，並顯示該資料繫結控制項的使用者介面 (UI) 項目。The class is the base class used for ASP.NET controls that retrieve tabular or list-style data from an ASP.NET data source control and bind user-interface (UI) elements of the control to that data for display. 複合資料繫結控制項，例如， ，和; 清單樣式資料繫結控制項，例如和; 和其他控制項，例如衍生自。Composite data-bound controls such as , , and ; list-style data-bound controls such as and ; and other controls such as derive from . 不使用網頁開發人員類別直接; 相反地，他們會使用衍生自這個類別的控制項。Page developers do not use the class directly; instead, they use controls that derive from this class. 控制項開發人員將延伸這個類別來建立資料繫結控制項，可搭配類別可實作介面和類別，衍生自和類別。Control developers extend this class to create data-bound controls that work with classes that implement the interface and classes that derive from the and classes. 衍生的類別時類別，覆寫方法來擷取資料繫結控制項的 UI 項目方法。When deriving a class from the class, override the method to bind the UI elements of your control to data retrieved by the method. 在大部分情況下，方法是您將會覆寫衍生類別中的唯一方法。In most cases, the method is the only method you will override in your derived class. ASP.NET 2.0 的資料繫結控制項，方法相當於`DataBind`方法，並將資料繫結在執行階段呼叫。For ASP.NET 2.0 data-bound controls, the method is the equivalent of the `DataBind` method, and is called to bind data at run time. 方法呼叫和方法。The method calls the and methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何自類別來建立自訂的資料繫結控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a class from the class to create a custom data-bound control. `TextBoxSet`控制項建立控制每個資料項目擷取自其相關聯的資料來源控制項，並在執行階段繫結至資料項目的值。The `TextBoxSet` control creates a control for each data item retrieved from its associated data source control, and binds to the value of the data item at run time. 目前的實作`Render`方法呈現控制項做為未排序的清單。The current implementation of the `Render` method renders the controls as an unordered list. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxset.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxset.vb#2)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`TextBoxSet`控制項，在上一個範例中，定義，並將它繫結控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `TextBoxSet` control, defined in the previous example, and bind it to an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxsetcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxsetvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件的目的是要讓您有機會指定所要呼叫資料方法位於不同的物件，而非物件。The purpose of this event is to give you an opportunity to specify that the data methods to be called are on a different object than the object. 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data).

value.span: 資料繫結控制項繫結至的特定資料清單名稱 (如果資料來源控制項提供多個清單)。

span.span: The name of the specific list of data that the data-bound control binds to, if more than one list is supplied by a data source control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定此屬性可讓`Item`和`BindItem`資料繫結運算式。Setting this property enables the `Item` and `BindItem` data-binding expressions. 設定這個方法會自動啟用動態資料功能。Setting this method automatically enables Dynamic Data functionality. 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data).

summary.span: 將檢視狀態中的控制項狀態設為已成功繫結至資料。

span.span: Sets the state of the control in view state as successfully bound to data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料繫結控制項維護指出它目前繫結至資料的檢視狀態中的值。The data-bound control maintains a value in view state that indicates whether it is currently bound to data. 方法將值設定為`true`。The method sets the value to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何方法由衍生的資料繫結控制項類別。The following code example demonstrates how the method is used by a derived data-bound control class. 所擷取的資料之後方法，並繫結至控制項方法，屬性設定為`false`和方法為呼叫來表示控制項已完成繫結，而不再在目前網頁的生命週期中需要它。After data is retrieved by the method and bound to the control with the method, the property is set to `false` and the method is called to signal that the control has completed binding and no longer requires it during the current page's life cycle. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. span.span: The source of the event, the .
An that contains event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法已變更基礎資料來源和控制項應重新繫結，以及應該執行任何所需的工作會告知資料繫結控制項。The method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source has changed and that the control should rebind and any necessary work should be performed. 一般而言，資料來源檢視的屬性已經變更時呼叫方法。Typically, the method is called when a property of the data source view has changed. 類別集屬性`true`時，便會產生事件。The class sets the property to `true` when it raises the event. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 設定資料繫結控制項在載入控制項之前的初始化狀態。

span.span: Sets the initialized state of the data-bound control before the control is loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會覆寫類別來設定屬性`true`在其中的 HTTP 要求是回傳，已啟用檢視狀態，但是資料繫結控制項具有尚未已繫結的情況下。The method is overridden by the class to set the property to `true` in cases where the HTTP request is a postback and view state is enabled but the data-bound control has not yet been bound. 此案例中是常見的控制項例如和，其中控制項的可見性則會在執行階段變更。This scenario is common with controls such as and , where the visibility of the control is changed at run time.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會將資料從資料來源繫結至控制項。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, binds data from the data source to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法，而不是方法衍生的資料繫結控制項時類別。Implement this method instead of the method when you derive a data-bound control from the class. 放置在控制項的資料繫結邏輯可讓您避免和引發事件的順序錯誤。Placing your control's data-binding logic in enables you to avoid the and events being raised in the wrong order. 雖然基底類別會提供任何特定的實作，此方法，方法透過呼叫方法，以將任何使用者介面 (UI) 的值繫結控制項所擷取的資料加入方法。While the base class provides no specific implementation for this method, the method is called by the method to bind the values of any user interface (UI) controls to the data that is retrieved by the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作從衍生類別中的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method in a class derived from . `TextBoxSet`控制項建立繫結至每個資料項目的控制項。The `TextBoxSet` control creates a control for each data item it is bound to. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxset.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxset.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void PerformSelect ();
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PerformSelect() cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PerformSelect ()
protected: override void PerformSelect();
override this.PerformSelect : unit -> unit

summary.span: 從關聯的資料來源擷取資料。

span.span: Retrieves data from the associated data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法將資料繫結至資料繫結控制項的項目擷取資料之後呼叫。The method is called after data is retrieved to bind data to elements of the data-bound control. 衍生的類型覆寫此方法的預設實作不是適當時才擷取資料。Derived types override this method to retrieve data only if the default implementation is not adequate. 一般而言，便可提供委派，會執行任何自訂資料的工作，而不需實作方法。Typically, it is sufficient to provide a delegate that performs any custom data work, rather than implementing the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法來擷取資料相關聯的資料來源使用方法並將它繫結至控制項的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to retrieve data from an associated data source using the method and bind it to the elements of the control. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxset.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxset.vb#3)]

summary.span: 儲存自從網頁回傳至伺服器以來所發生的任何檢視狀態變更。

span.span: Saves any view-state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
The control's current view state.

returns.span: 如果沒有與控制項相關聯的檢視狀態，則這個方法會傳回 。

span.span: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns .

summary.span: 取得 物件，當從資料來源控制項擷取資料時資料繫結控制項會使用它。

span.span: Gets a object that the data-bound control uses when retrieving data from a data source control.

value.span: 值，資料繫結控制項將其用於擷取資料。

span.span: A value used by the data-bound control to retrieve data.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性呼叫方法來建立預設物件。The property calls the method to create a default object.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string SelectMethod { get; set; }
.property instance string SelectMethod
Public Overridable Property SelectMethod As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ SelectMethod { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SelectMethod : string with get, set

summary.span: 為了讀取資料要呼叫的方法的名稱。

span.span: The name of the method to call in order to read data.
The name of the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性會導致模型繫結來做為資料繫結方法。Setting this property causes model binding to be used as the data-binding method. 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data).

summary.span: 導致對控制項的檢視狀態變更進行追蹤，以便它們能夠儲存於控制項的 物件。

span.span: Causes view-state changes to the control to be tracked so they can be stored in the control's object.

span.span: An object set to the property.

summary.span: 驗證資料繫結控制項繫結至的物件是該資料繫結控制項所使用的物件。

span.span: Verifies that the object a data-bound control binds to is one it can work with.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法只會呼叫類別的 mutator (`set`存取子) 的屬性。The method is only called in the class's mutator (`set` accessor) for the property. 類別會檢查已設定的物件型別屬性，以確保它是的執行個體， ，或介面。The class checks the type of the object that is set for the property to ensure that it is an instance of the , , or interface.

exception.span: 參數所傳遞的物件不是 或辨認型別。

span.span: The object passed by the parameter is not or a recognized type.
